test.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT CounterID, EventDate FROM hits_10m_single) ORDER BY toFloat32(toFloat64(toFloat32(toFloat64(CounterID)))) FORMAT Null

SELECT * FROM (SELECT CounterID, EventDate FROM hits_10m_single) ORDER BY toFloat32(toFloat64(toFloat32(toFloat64(CounterID)))) DESC, toFloat32(toFloat64(toFloat32(toFloat64(EventDate)))) ASC FORMAT Null
